name: Stacky Hero (PlayDate)
description:
Crank to stack boxes and help your Hero to pass obstacles.

Stacky Hero is the fun, addicting game you've been waiting for.

Instructions

  • Crank Clockwise  to stack boxes 
  • Crank Counter-Clockwise to remove boxes
  • You can slide on top of obstacles but can't add boxes only remove

Increasing Difficulty

  • More tricky obstacles will come with each level
  • Time your stacking to avoid hitting an obstacle

Visual Effects 

  • Explosion and screen shake

Controls

  • Crank or UP/DOWN Arrows

To install the game on your Playdate, follow the directions on the official Playdate site.
